### Health Services Officer (HSO) - Nova Scotia

#### Request for Proposal

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids to provide Health Services Officer (HSO) services on a part-time, as-needed basis.

**Contract Details**

* Contract period: one year with options of two additional years
* Work location: RCMP Occupational Health Unit in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia
* Security clearance: Enhanced Reliability Top Secret
* Hours: approximately 15-22 hours per week

**Service Requirements**

* Provide expert medical consultations and opinions on RCMP member fitness for duty and suitability for benefits and services
* Conduct health assessments for RCMP members, including determinations of suitability for:
	+ Maximal exertion to use a firearm
	+ Professional driving of emergency vehicles
	+ Isolated posting and foreign duties

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Technical merit: evaluated on a scale of 0-50 points
* Price: evaluated on a combined rating with technical merit

**Submission Requirements**

* Bids must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Refer to attached tender documents for further information
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Important Notes**

* Canada will make notice of proposed procurement, bid solicitations, and related documents available for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service
* Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting the service for the most up-to-date information
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada; integrity provisions will be applied in this procurement
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory is an online resource for bidders to increase visibility and compete for federal government contracts set aside for Indigenous businesses

**Contact Information**

(902) 720-5121
